edges.label: 1. Contract Awarded
edges.tooltip: Contract for X-ray equipment awarded to Vendor on 2003-04-04.

edges.label: 2. Contract Signed
edges.tooltip: Divisional Manager signed the contract before capital expenditure approval.

edges.label: 3. Premature Notification
edges.tooltip: Divisional Manager signed notification before obtaining KTA's formal approval.

edges.label: 4. Investigation Subject
edges.tooltip: Investigation focused on administrative irregularities at Pristina Airport.

edges.label: 5. Investigation Conducted By
edges.tooltip: UNMIK conducted the investigation into the irregularities.
